My entrepreneurial journey:

Title: Implementation of dataflow-based video decoders on hardware platforms, with HEVC as study use case.
My thesis work is in the context of compression of images and videos, by proposing methods of the optimization of the algorithms of image coding as well as the algorithms of rapid prototyping from the video coding algorithms in the embedded systems.
Title: Implementation of dataflow-based video decoders on hardware platforms, with HEVC as study use case. My thesis work is in the context of compression of images and videos, by proposing methods of the optimization of the algorithms of image coding as well as the algorithms of rapid prototyping from the video coding algorithms in the embedded systems.

3.name: Elie Bou Assi
3.about:
Elie Bou Assi is an assistant professor in the Department of Neuroscience at the Université de Montréal and a principal scientist at the Centre Hospitalier de l’Université de Montréal (CHUM). 
His research interests cover the application of artificial intelligence techniques and the internet of things to improve the management of neurological and psychiatric conditions.
